p: Pure strains of bacteria ( Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 13709, Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 35984, Streptococcus pyogenes ATCC 19615 , Eschrechia coli ATCC 9637, Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 1705, Proteus vulgaris ATCC 8427, Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853 and Shigella boydii ATCC 9905) as well as pure strains of Candida albicans ATCC 10231, Candida glabrata ATCC 90030, Candida krusei ATCC 14243 and Candida parapsilosis ATCC 22019 were used. All micro-organisms were kindly supplied from the Microbiology Department, Faculty of Pharmacy, Al-Azhar University, Nasr City, Cairo, Egypt.
